name: @dbf/vscode
description: Visual studio code to generate barrel files for the Dart language.

dart-barrel-file-generator.defaultBarrel.title: Default barrel file name
dart-barrel-file-generator.defaultBarrel.markdownDescription: The default name for the barrel file is `<folder-name>.dart`. You can override this name by setting a custom name. If there's any whitespace in the name it will be replaced by a '-' and the name **will be transformed to lowercase**.

dart-barrel-file-generator.promptName.title: Open input on file generation
dart-barrel-file-generator.promptName.description: Get promted asking for the name of the barrel file that will be created

dart-barrel-file-generator.excludeFileLi.title: Additional patterns to exclude files
dart-barrel-file-generator.excludeFileLi.description: Add the file patterns that you want to exclude (as glob patterns). Excluded files will not be added to the barrel file.

dart-barrel-file-generator.excludeDirLis.title: Additional patterns to exclude directories
dart-barrel-file-generator.excludeDirLis.description: Add the directory patterns that you want to exclude (as glob patterns). A barrel file will not be generated for these directories.

dart-barrel-file-generator.prependFolder.title: Prepend name of the folder to the generated file
dart-barrel-file-generator.prependFolder.markdownDescription: Prepend the name of the folder to the generated files, e.g.: `<folder-name>_<barrel-file>.dart`.

dart-barrel-file-generator.appendFolderN.title: Append name of the folder to the generated file
dart-barrel-file-generator.appendFolderN.markdownDescription: Append the name of the folder to the generated files, e.g.: `<barrel-file>_<folder-name>.dart`.

dart-barrel-file-generator.skipEmpty.title: Skip empty folders
dart-barrel-file-generator.skipEmpty.description: Skip generating barrel files for folders that are empty (or do not contain any valid dart file)

dart-barrel-file-generator.prependPackag.title: Append package name to lib exports
dart-barrel-file-generator.prependPackag.markdownDescription: It will prepend `package:<package-name>/...` as a prefix of the export exclusively for the root file under `lib/`. It detects the name of the package by analysing the path of the project.
